articles.title: NTT Launches Second-Generation Generative AI Tsuzumi2
articles.summary: NTT launched "tsuzumi2," a second-generation generative AI large language model (LLM) on October 20th. The new model strengthens domain-specific capabilities in finance, healthcare, and local government. NTT expects revenue from its AI-related business to surpass 150 billion yen by the end of the current fiscal year and exceed 500 billion yen by the end of fiscal 2027.

articles.title: Webjet unveils bold brand transformation to become Australasia's go-to travel companion
articles.author: Natasha Lee
articles.summary: Webjet has launched a new creative platform and campaign titled "Go Somewhere" developed with The Hallway, marking its biggest brand overhaul in 27 years. This includes a reimagined logo, a sleek new website design, and an expanded product offering across hotels, packages, tours, and business travel to create a seamless travel experience.

articles.title: 'I finally tried the iconic perfume that's been a favourite for over 50 years'
articles.author: John Rogan-Gaz
articles.summary: Estée Lauder initially launched Youth Dew as a bath oil in 1958, which then transitioned into a perfume. This fragrance, with its blend of opulent flowers, rich spices, and warm woods, is available at various retailers like Amazon for £20.48, Savers for £24.99, The Perfume Shop for £29.99, and Boots for £60.

articles.title: Derry's Alchemy Technology Services acquired by Japanese technology giant NTT DATA
articles.author: Kevin Mullan
articles.summary: NTT DATA acquired Alchemy Technology Services to enhance its digital transformation capabilities in the insurance industry. This acquisition will allow NTT DATA to offer smarter, scalable solutions to insurers worldwide and establishes a Global Centre of Excellence in Derry. Alchemy's expertise in Guidewire and the specialty insurance market also contributed to the decision.

articles.title: Not ruined, but evolved: The electric Mercedes-Benz G-Class
articles.author: Mail Guardian South Africa
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz is releasing a fully electric version of the G-Class car. This new electric G-Class maintains the classic design of the original.

articles.title: Putting Kmart's $8 Mini Vacuum Cleaner to the test
articles.author: Caitie Browne
articles.summary: Kmart launched a mini vacuum cleaner, which is being tested for its ability to clean keyboards. The review indicates it effectively removes crumbs from keyboards, although larger crumbs may spill out.

articles.title: The 6 Best AI Chatbots for Everyday Life
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT is an AI chatbot known for its versatility in writing, learning, and coding. ChatTide is presented as a simpler alternative for basic tasks. Google's Gemini is multimodal and integrates with Google apps. Perplexity combines AI with live web search, while Quora's Poe is a platform for multiple AI models. Character AI focuses on creative and social interaction through unique characters, and Monica is an AI assistant designed for convenience within browsers and applications.

articles.title: Xmind Reinvents Itself: From Mind Mapping Pioneer to Lightweight Project Management Innovator
articles.author: Evertise
articles.summary: Xmind has launched a reimagined platform that expands beyond mind mapping into lightweight project management powered by AI. This new release introduces a fresh interface and AI Work Breakdown, transforming projects into actionable steps. Users can switch between mind map and Gantt chart views with perfect synchronization, while built-in task dependencies automatically update connected tasks when dates or durations need modification.

articles.title: Ultra-wealthy tech bros are seeking out a new amenity for their multimillion-dollar homes
articles.author: Mary K. Jacob
articles.summary: McClean Design is incorporating advanced AI integrations into high-end homes, including AI-driven controls for lighting, temperature, security with facial recognition and anomaly detection. Features also include smart appliances like refrigerators suggesting grocery lists and washing machines tailoring cycles based on fabric type, reflecting a move towards fully integrated smart home systems.

articles.title: Robots to hawk produce to customers at Chicago-area Jewel stores in trial run
articles.author: Decatur
articles.summary: Jewel-Osco stores in the Chicago suburbs have introduced Servi, an AI-powered cart. Servi follows shoppers and uses prerecorded messages to encourage purchases, such as bananas.

articles.title: New Balance's $160 Highly Rated Sneakers Are Now Just $80 — 'Super Comfy and Stylish'
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: JD Sports and Finish Line are offering New Balance retro sneakers at a 50% discount, highlighting the product's comfort as noted by buyers.

articles.title: Readers' Reflections: China's new quality productive forces offer constructive path forward for global sustainable development
articles.summary: China is focusing on 'new quality productive forces' characterized by innovation, high technology, high efficiency, and high quality. Chinese firms such as DeepSeek and Unitree Robotics have made breakthroughs in various sectors like AI and robotics. China is also advancing in areas such as 5G networks, renewable energy, and electric vehicle manufacturing.

articles.title: Hayati Vape
articles.author: Jack Garrison
articles.summary: Hayati Vape introduced a comprehensive vaping product line in 2025 to challenge market giants like Lost Mary and Elf Bar. This includes the Hayati Pro Max Plus prefilled pod system, the high-puff-count Hayati Pro Ultra Plus 25000, Hayati Nic Salts for refillable systems, and the innovative Hayati Quokka range of refillable pod kits. These products target different user needs and aim to create a cohesive ecosystem that keeps customers within the Hayati brand as their preferences evolve.

articles.title: Genesis unveils enhanced GV70 with new features and options
articles.author: Alimat Aliyeva
articles.summary: Genesis, Hyundai Motor Group's luxury brand, launched an upgraded GV70 SUV featuring enhanced comfort, advanced technology, and flexible package options. The new GV70 offers improved noise control and a new color option, Bering Blue. Genesis aims to provide a more refined mobility experience with this updated model.

articles.title: ‘The Best Coffee Maker I Have Ever Owned' Is Only $99 At Walmart Today
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Specialty coffee maker, a machine that creates both hot and iced drinks. It includes a built-in milk frother, reusable filter, and removable water reservoir. It is currently on sale at Walmart for $99.

articles.title: BYD eMax 9 DMi brings 1,000-km range and premium comfort to Philippine roads
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: BYD Philippines, through AC Mobility, is preparing to unveil the BYD eMax 9 DMi. The eMax 9 DMi is a luxurious plug-in hybrid MPV featuring elegant design, long-distance efficiency, and cutting-edge technology.

articles.title: Jessica Simpson's Newest Fragrance Mystic Canyon Represents an 'Empowering' Time of 'Self-Discovery' in Her Life (Exclusive)
articles.author: Hedy Phillips
articles.summary: Jessica Simpson has launched her new fragrance, Mystic Canyon, under the Jessica Simpson Collection. The fragrance, available at JCPenney, includes notes of pink pepper, vanilla, and amber. This is her first fragrance launch in five years, and includes notes of purple plum, jasmine, vanilla bean and more notes for a warm embrace.

articles.title: Yes, I automated laundry tracking with AI — and it suggests clothes to wear
articles.author: Yadullah Abidi
articles.summary: An individual built a prototype laundry tracking app that automates tracking clothes using NFC tags and a local server. The app uses a local LLM to analyze clothes and suggest outfits based on mood and garment status, integrating garment information like type, brand, and color. Future expansions are considered: weather integration, multi-user support, laundry scheduling, smart mirror mode, and outfit generation improvements.

articles.title: This 'very reliable' laptop is usually $800, but Amazon has it marked down to just $300 — shoppers call it the 'perfect budget laptop'
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: Amazon Canada is offering the 15.6-inch Jumper Laptop with Office 365 on sale for $300, a $500 discount. The laptop features Windows 11, a one-year Office 365 subscription, 128GB of storage with an extra 1TB SSD slot, and a 15-inch HD display. User reviews describe it as fast, easy to carry, and suitable for everyday use.

articles.title: IKEA's smartphone bed will reward customers who use it
articles.summary: IKEA has launched the 'Phone Sleep Collection,' a miniature bed for smartphones, in the UAE. The bed, featuring an NFC chip, tracks phone usage and rewards users who keep their phones undisturbed for seven hours a night for seven consecutive nights with a shopping voucher. Memac Ogilvy created the Phone Sleep Collection for IKEA.

articles.title: M&S launches three new beauty gift sets full of big brands with up to 60% off
articles.author: Catherine Addison-Swan
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer has launched three new beauty gift sets: the Bath and Body Gift Bag (£25), the Skincare Gift Bag (£30), and the Haircare Gift Bag (£30). These sets feature products from brands like This Works, NEOM, Clinique, Emma Hardie, Philip Kingsley, and Aveda, offering significant savings compared to purchasing the products individually.

articles.title: 94% of Women Saw Results From This Rare Japanese Ferment — And It's Finally on Sale!
articles.author: Madi Koetting
articles.summary: Albion Cosmetics is promoting its Flora Drip S essence, featuring MYURAT™, and EXCIA Double Key Advanced Serum, combining botanical extracts with macadamia, argan, and vitamin C. For a limited time, customers can get 10% off all Albion Cosmetics products with code GOLOOT10.

articles.title: Next gen Xbox is '100%' in development says Microsoft but fans aren't so sure
articles.summary: Microsoft is developing its next-generation Xbox hardware in partnership with AMD, focusing on prototyping and design. The company is also working on optimizing the experience and scaling out the handheld compatibility program for devices like the ROG Xbox Ally, produced by Asus, potentially including Xbox console emulation. Microsoft is aiming to offer more choices, games, benefits, and improvements to the user experience.

articles.title: Netcore Cloud Launches AI Shopping Agent: The Intelligent Assistant Redefining E-commerce Engagement
articles.summary: Netcore Cloud launched its Shopping Agent, a conversational commerce solution designed to personalize product discovery and drive sales. The Shopping Agent is intended to act as a digital sales companion, improving conversion rates and average order value through personalized interactions. The agent integrates with PIM, CDP, and analytics systems and aims to enhance the customer experience across various digital touchpoints.

articles.title: Los Angeles SEO Launches Revolutionary AI-Powered Digital Marketing Suite to Transform Business Growth
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Los Angeles SEO has launched its new AI-Powered Digital Marketing Suite, integrating services such as Website Design Transformation, AI-Powered Content Optimization, Intelligent Local SEO, and Data-Driven SEO Strategies. This suite aims to enhance digital marketing results through AI, providing innovative solutions for businesses by optimizing website design, content, local SEO, and data-driven strategies.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A Tops UK Physical Charts, Launch Sales Down 40 Percent Over Arceus
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Game Freak launched Pokémon Legends: Z-A on Nintendo Switch 1 and 2. This marks the first title in the franchise for the latter. The game has topped physical sales charts.

articles.title: Viltrox AF 85mm F2.0 EVO FE Mount Lens: A Compact, Precision-built Powerhouse
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Viltrox is launching its new EVO lineup with the AF 85mm F2.0 EVO FE lens. This new optic aims to deliver spectacular results for creators.

articles.title: X Link Update: How It Helps Boost Engagement
articles.author: Rukayat Badmus
articles.summary: X (formerly Twitter) is testing a new feature on iOS that keeps link posts visible at the bottom of the screen when users click on external links, enabling users to interact with posts even while browsing external content. This update aims to help creators get more engagement on posts that include links. It is expected to roll out to Android and desktop users soon if the experiment goes well.

articles.title: The 24 best Lovehoney sex toys of all time UK 2025
articles.author: Honey Wyatt
articles.summary: Lovehoney, a virtual sex shop, offers a wide range of sex toys, including vibrators and dildos like the Lovehoney Magic Bullet and Lovehoney Curved Silicone Dildo. The company provides detailed product descriptions, reviews, how-to guides, and advice, catering to both beginners and experienced users seeking clitoral or G-spot stimulation.

articles.title: Marketing experts warn AI could soon be making purchases for users
articles.author: Yuanyuan
articles.summary: OpenAI and Stripe launched the Agentic Commerce Protocol on September 29, 2025. This new technology enables instant purchases from Etsy within ChatGPT conversations and is scheduled to expand to over 1 million Shopify merchants. The protocol represents a significant shift in online shopping with the use of ambient AI.

articles.title: Tai Beauty Group Expands Global Presence with Launch of Scentuals in European Retailers Tisak Media and dm-drogerie markt
articles.author: Tai Beauty Group Ltd
articles.summary: Tai Beauty Group's brand, Scentuals, has launched its skincare, body care, beauty oils, travel kits, and aromatherapy collections in Croatian retailer Tisak Media. This launch expands Scentuals' European presence following its debut in dm-drogerie markt, bringing its natural and cruelty-free products to a broader audience.

articles.title: Lenovo Advances the AI-Enabled Workforce with Agentic AI: Trusted, Proven, and Ready to Deliver ROI
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Lenovo has launched new agentic AI capabilities as part of its AI-Enabled Workforce portfolio, offering a suite of devices, services, and solutions. This includes Lenovo AI PCs with dedicated AI processors and ThinkShield protection, as well as TruScale Device as a Service, providing flexible and sustainable IT solutions. The new AI Services are designed to simplify deployment and improve operational efficiencies for businesses.

articles.title: 31 Fall Organization Products For Your Piles Of Stuff
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: A variety of new organizational and storage products are introduced, including stackable storage bins, spice shelves, jewelry holders, stackable drawers, shoe towers, and storage carts. These products aim to provide solutions for decluttering and optimizing space in various areas of the home, such as closets, kitchens, and bedrooms.

articles.title: Adobe launches a foundry service that builds custom generative AI models for enteprises
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak
articles.summary: Adobe has launched Adobe AI Foundry, a new service that allows enterprises to build custom generative AI models trained on their branding and intellectual property. These custom models are built off Adobe's Firefly family of AI models and can produce text, images, video, and other mediums like 3D scenes. The foundry service pricing is based on usage.

articles.title: realme 15 Series 5G Hits the Shelves in Pakistan with AI Edit Genie
articles.author: Sania Saeed
articles.summary: Realme has launched the realme 15 Series 5G in Pakistan, featuring three models: the realme 15 Pro, realme 15 5G, and realme 15T. The series includes features like the AI Edit Genie for photo editing, AI Party Mode for low-light photography, and a Triple 50MP Ultra Clear Camera system, with the 15 Pro and 15 5G offering 80W Ultra Charge and a 7000mAh Titan Battery.

articles.title: M&S beauty bags can save shoppers up to 60%
articles.author: Catherine Addison-Swan
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer has introduced three new gift bags: Bath and Body, Skincare, and Haircare. Each gift bag features miniature products from popular brands, available at reduced prices.  Additionally, Marks and Spencer offers a Beauty Advent Calendar in collaboration with Bella Freud, containing both full-size and sample-size products.

articles.title: Red5Server upgrades all dedicated streaming servers to NVMe SSD storage and 10 Gbps ports, offers free Wowza
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Red5Server announced a major hardware upgrade to its dedicated live-streaming servers, now running on NVMe SSD storage and 10 Gbps network ports. To celebrate, Red5Server is offering the Wowza Streaming Engine add-on free of charge for all new dedicated-server customers through December 2025. This promotion gives clients access to a professional-grade streaming engine with full RTMP, HLS, and MPEG-DASH support.

articles.title: Red5Server upgrades all dedicated streaming servers to NVMe SSD storage and 10 Gbps ports, offers free Wowza
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Red5Server.com has upgraded its dedicated live-streaming servers with NVMe SSD storage and 10 Gbps network ports. To promote this upgrade, Red5Server is offering the Wowza Streaming Engine add-on free of charge for all new dedicated-server customers through December 2025. These upgrades aim to provide faster performance, reduced latency, and greater reliability.

articles.title: 36 TikTok Products To Make Being A Human Easier
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: PanOxyl launched Acne Banishing Body Spray, effective for breakouts and acne scars. Eos introduced a limited-edition Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment. Menokin launched 30-Second Collagen Bubble Mask for quick hydration. Olay released Super Serum Body Wash containing niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. Shark introduced a lightweight Pet cordless vacuum cleaner. Dae launched Hair Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream & Taming Wand. Kitsch designed flat claw clip for functionality. The Pink Stuff introduced "Sqeezy" sponge set for cleaning. I Dew Care launched a Benzene-free dry shampoo powder.

articles.title: NCC, Ookla launch national coverage map to boost transparency, data-driven telecom regulation
articles.author: Folake Balogun
articles.summary: Nigerian Communications Commission (NCC) in partnership with Ookla launched a crowdsourcing report and National Coverage Maps. The platform aims to improve consumer experience in the telecommunications sector. It provides data-driven insights and coverage information.

articles.title: Zedge's Dataseeds.AI Grows its Enterprise Customer Base for Rights-Cleared, On-Demand Visual Datasets
articles.summary: Zedge, Inc. is experiencing growing demand for DataSeeds.AI, its B2B platform that offers scalable, rights-cleared image datasets for AI training. DataSeeds.AI leverages Zedge's catalog of images and the GuruShots photography game to fulfill customer requests for custom image datasets. Enhancements to DataSeeds.AI's search technology improve the discovery of relevant content.

articles.title: 2025 OMODA&JAECOO International User Summit Charts a New Chapter as AIMOGA Unveils Brand-New Global Strategy
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: AIMOGA, incubated by OMODA&JAECOO's parent company, launched its new brand strategy at the 2025 AIMOGA Global Launch. OMODA&JAECOO will also introduce new car models including J7, J7 PHEV, J8, and C9 in Malaysia to meet local market demand.

articles.title: Harm reduction minimises negative effects of smoking
articles.author: Sibongile Mashaba
articles.summary: Philip Morris International (PMI) is focused on developing and commercializing smoke-free products to transition smokers away from cigarettes. The company is advocating for regulations that differentiate between high-risk and lower-risk products, promoting smoke-free alternatives based on scientific data. PMI aims to make these innovative options accessible to smokers.

articles.title: I tested the Blackview Xplore 2 rugged phone and an all-in-one work and creative tool - but it's not for everyone
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: A bulky smartphone features a 100-inch projection, a large battery capacity, and AI applications, making it an interesting new product choice.

articles.title: High-tech cleaning gadgets that actually make life easier
articles.author: The Curator Team
articles.summary: The article highlights new home cleaning and air purification products. ECOVACS Winbot Mini cleans windows, while the Dreame L40 is a wet/dry robot vacuum and mop. The TUSHY Classic 3.0 is a self-cleaning bidet attachment. Dupray NEAT Plus Steam Cleaner sanitizes surfaces with steam. The LG Styler uses steam to refresh clothes. Dyson's V16 Piston Animal Cordless Vacuum features a compaction system. The Dyson HushJet HJ10 Air Purifier uses jet engine technology for quiet air purification.

articles.title: Jason Blum's Crêpe Pan, Loafers Worth Buying, and Other Recent Strategist Finds
articles.author: The Editors
articles.summary: Ghia recommends nylon drawer pulls from Hewi, available in multiple colors and shapes. Additionally, a pink ergonomic mouse is introduced as a new solution for hand pain management, featuring a compression sleeve with a cooling-gel pack. The Laguiole knife is stylish but works as well as a hard-core steakhouse knife.

articles.title: Yiwu Global Digital Trade Center opens with AI-driven innovation
org: Yiwu China Small Commodities City Big Data Co., Ltd
articles.summary: Huang Zixuan launched an AI design platform in 2023 that helps clients confirm designs without physical samples, cutting production time and reducing material waste. Additionally, Tencent partnered with Yiwu China Small Commodities City Big Data Co., Ltd. to develop an AI-powered navigation and shopping guide app.

articles.title: This Must-Have $5 Baking Find at Aldi Helps You Make Picture-Perfect Holiday Cookies
articles.author: Kenn C. Bivins
articles.summary: Aldi is offering the Crofton 7-Piece Cookie or Pie Stamping Set for $5. This set includes six stamps for creating festive designs on cookies or pies. The tool is designed to be easy to clean and store.

articles.title: Netto Online Offers 43% Discount on Red Bull Supply Packs
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Netto launched a limited-time promotion on October 20, 2025, offering a 43% discount on Red Bull 24-packs, priced at €18.96. The promotion includes various Red Bull flavors like Sugarfree, Green Edition, Red Edition, and White Edition. Due to high demand, Netto is replenishing stock to meet customer needs.

articles.title: Honor Confirms Launch of ‘Robot Phone' at MWC 2026
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Honor confirmed the debut of its Robot Phone at MWC 2026 in March. The Robot Phone features a moving gimbal-style camera and AI-driven interactive features, hinting at a new category of smart devices. Further details, including technical specifications and pricing, are expected at Honor's MWC presentation.

articles.title: Genesis launches upgraded GV70 with improved features, options
articles.author: 장동우
articles.summary: Genesis, Hyundai Motor Group's luxury brand, launched an upgraded GV70 SUV featuring enhanced noise, vibration, and harshness (NVH) control, additional sound-absorbing materials, and a new Bering Blue color. The upgraded model offers new package options, providing customers with more flexible choices to meet the tastes of customers seeking a premium and trendy SUV.

articles.title: Agibot unveils world-first humanoid robot with cross-shaped wrist arm
articles.author: Kaif Shaikh
articles.summary: Agibot has launched the Agibot G2, a next-generation industrial-grade embodied robot, designed for commercial environments. The G2 integrates advanced motion systems, multimodal AI interaction, and autonomous operation for applications like factory production and logistics. Following successful trials, Agibot G2 is now formally deploying in automotive parts manufacturing and has already been adopted in consumer electronics precision production.

articles.title: Pollo AI Launches Revolutionary AI Video Editor to Transform Videos with Prompt
articles.summary: Pollo AI has launched its AI video editor, a tool that allows users to transform videos using text prompts. The editor features capabilities like modifying subject appearance, changing weather, adding visual effects, erasing objects, altering backgrounds, and adjusting camera angles. This aims to streamline video editing and make it accessible to a broader audience.

articles.title: Lidl makes massive change to payments in ALL stores under app shake-up
articles.summary: Lidl has introduced a new payment feature called Lidl Pay within its Lidl Plus app, enabling customers to pay for their shopping directly through the app on their smartphones. Customers can link their bank card to the app through the 'My wallet' section and activate Lidl Pay for use at regular tills or self-checkouts, with discounts automatically applied.

articles.title: These 28 Products May Be Unexciting, Ordinary, Or Just Plain Mundane — But Somehow They're Still Life Changing
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff launched their new "Sqeezy" set, expanding their cleaning paste line with a versatile cleaning sponge. Medicube introduced "Zero Pore" Pads, featuring dual-textured pads containing lactic and salicylic acid, designed to control sebum, exfoliate skin, and refine pores.

articles.title: Want to try kosher food? Want edibles? Try these new NJ spots
articles.author: Daniel Munoz
articles.summary: Sweet Spot Farms opened a cannabis dispensary on Sept. 30 in River Edge, selling pre-rolls, edibles, vapes, and flowers. Salt and Butter, a kosher eatery, opened on Sept. 10 in Paramus, offering dishes from salmon to fettuccini alfredo and desserts. The Paper Store, featuring fashion and beauty products, opened on Oct. 18 in Clifton and provides in-store experiences like candy carts and customization stations.

articles.title: Zebediela dreamer makes a roaring success of gran's recipe
articles.author: Sunday World
articles.summary: Khutsiso Chuene Mosetsho launched Queen Mosima Mayonnaise in 2015, inspired by his grandmother's recipe. Following a recent television appearance, demand for the product has surged. Mosetsho is now building a small factory to expand production and meet increasing demand for Queen Mosima Mayonnaise.

articles.title: Developer creates Windows 11 version for older, low-spec PCs
articles.summary: NTDev has launched 'tiny11 25H2,' a streamlined version of Windows 11, designed for installation on low-specification computers. Key features include reduced hard drive space, bypassing Microsoft Account login during setup, and compatibility with older hardware. The developer also created 'tiny11 core', an even more minimalist version with a smaller installation file size.

articles.title: WhatsApp rolls out AI-based image generator for status updates; how to use it
articles.author: Our Correspondent
articles.summary: WhatsApp has launched a new feature enabling users to generate AI images for Status updates via text prompts. This tool, powered by Meta's AI, provides visual options based on user inputs, allowing customization with emojis, stickers, or text before posting as a Status. The feature is currently being rolled out to a limited number of users on iOS and Android.

articles.title: All-new water-resistant AI phone Honor X7d now official for as low as P7,299!
articles.summary: Honor Philippines has launched the Honor X7d smartphone, featuring a 6500mAh battery, 108MP camera, and AI capabilities. The phone is available for pre-order until October 24, with a free Camping Light Speaker. The 256GB Variant will also be available exclusively online for P7,299.

articles.title: New airstrip built on a Yemen island as Houthi shipments targeted
articles.summary: A new airstrip is under construction on Yemen's Zuqar Island. Ship-tracking data analyzed by the AP shows the Batsa, a Togolese-flagged bulk carrier registered to a Dubai-based maritime firm, spent nearly a week alongside the new dock at Zuqar Island after coming from Berbera in Somaliland, the site of a DP World port.

articles.title: Educating AI Engineers: Exploring the Ascendancy of AI Enablement and PromptOps Solutions
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Cognizant's Neuro AI platform now features multi-agent AI orchestration designed to boost AI productivity within enterprises. Several companies have already used the platform to create, test, and deploy AI applications to improve their business outcomes. The platform facilitates the rapid development and testing of AI-driven decision-making applications.

articles.title: 31 Amazon Pet Products Our Readers Are Loving In 2025
articles.author: Courtney Hayes
articles.summary: The article lists various new products and services for pet owners, including a reusable lint brush for removing pet hair, Bissell Stomp 'N Go pet lifting pads for cleaning messes, a pet odor eliminator, nail clippers for pets, and a rubber broom and squeegee for collecting pet hair. Additionally, the products include a Bissell portable carpet cleaner and car detailer, grooming kit, deshedding brush, interactive cat toy, catnip ball toy, litter box odor eliminator, interactive cat toy, cat treats, cat litter, cat grass growing kit, cat purée side dish, flopping fish toy, and cat litter mat.

articles.title: WhatsApp Brings AI Image Generation For Status Updates For iOS And Android: How To Create And Share AI-Made Visuals
articles.author: Ankur Mishra
articles.summary: WhatsApp, owned by Meta, is launching a new AI-powered image generation tool that allows users to create custom AI-generated visuals for their status updates. Powered by Meta AI, users can type text prompts within the WhatsApp app, which will then generate multiple image variations based on those prompts, and share the generated image as a status.

articles.title: Next's £10 a set 'soft and cosy' loungewear is perfect for autumn
articles.author: Sam Dimmer-COV
articles.summary: Next is offering its new product, the Three-Pack of Long-Sleeve Long-Leg Jersey Pyjamas, for £30. The loungewear sets are crafted from soft, breathable jersey fabric and include three long-sleeved tops and three full-length bottoms in berry, pink, and navy polka dot print. These are available in sizes extra small to extra large.

articles.title: Just 55 Things That Renters Swear By And You Might Too — Even If You Own Your Own Home
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article presents a variety of cleaning products. These include items such as a weekly shower cleaner, toilet cleaning stamps, dishwasher-cleaning tablets, a pet hair remover, and mold and mildew remover spray as well as the Green Gobbler Drain Clog Dissolver and the EasyWring microfiber spin mop.

articles.title: BYD focusing on PHEVs amid sales charge
articles.author: James Wong
articles.summary: BYD initially launched as an all-electric vehicle (EV) brand in Australia. The Chinese auto brand is expanding its lineup and attracting more demand for its plug-in hybrid (PHEV) models.

articles.title: From the palm of your hand to the stars
articles.summary: Huawei, Xiaomi, and Oppo have launched 36 smartphone models with built-in satellite connectivity. China Telecom's satellite unit pioneered satellite-direct automotive services, allowing drivers to contact their automaker's call center via satellite. China Telecom expects to sell over 100,000 satellite-direct vehicle models by the end of the year.

articles.title: 25 Budget Target Finds For Perfect Skin
articles.author: Isabella Sarlija
articles.summary: The article showcases several new skincare and beauty products, including a hyaluronic acid serum for hydration, E.l.f.'s Blue-ty Sleep Oil and lip mask, Eos Shea Butter Cashmere Body Wash, and a nail and cuticle repair oil. It also highlights products like Naturium's multi-peptide moisturizer, CeraVe's under-eye cream, Black Girl sunscreen spray, and Tree Hut's Tropic Glow whipped body butter, all designed for various skin concerns and beauty routines.

articles.title: Honey NZ's Mānuka Phuel plans international push after rapid local growth
articles.author: Tom Raynel
articles.summary: Honey NZ launched Mānuka Phuel, an all-natural energy drink sweetened with mānuka honey, available in three flavors: Big Buzz, Collagen Buzz, and Hydro Buzz. The company is planning to release a ready-to-drink product, glow-in-the-dark cans, and sparkling water, and is also exploring expansion to Australia.

articles.title: Fans Are Freaking Out About Yasso's New Ice Cream Product
articles.author: Lauren Jarvis-Gibson
articles.summary: Yasso has launched a new product called "Spoonables", which are 14-ounce pints of creamy frozen Greek yogurt. These pints are available in five popular flavors and are exclusively sold at Target. The product is marketed as a healthier alternative to traditional ice cream, with lower sugar and calorie content.

articles.title: 39 Things To Buy If You're Just In The Mood To Shop
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: Eos introduced its new Crème de Pistachio Shea Better Body Lotion. McCormick launched a limited-edition Finishing Sugar. L'Oreal Paris Makeup released True Match Lumi Glotion. Monday Haircare launched new Keratin enriched Dry Shampoo. Dr Teal's introduced the "Cozy Vanilla Season" Epsom salt magnesium soak.

articles.title: New Oil-Free Scroll Air Compressor "G Series" Launched [Hitachi Industrial Equipment Systems Co., Ltd.] (Hitachi Ltd)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: A new "G Series" Oil-Free Scroll Air Compressor has been launched. The compressor is oil-free and designed for unspecified applications.

articles.title: China's new humanoid robot handles raw egg with world-first cross-shaped wrist arm
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: Agibot has launched the Agibot G2, a next-generation industrial-grade embodied robot designed for commercial environments. The G2 humanoid features advanced motion systems, multimodal AI interaction, and autonomous operation to support various applications including factory production.

articles.title: Mystery Jersey King scores a hat-trick in sales since Dragons' Den apperance
articles.author: The Business Desk
articles.summary: Mystery Jersey King, founded by Alex Street, experienced sales doubling after appearing on BBC's Dragons' Den in January 2025. The company delivers a randomly selected authentic jersey via a surprise-box service.

articles.title: Walmart's AI Shopping Revolution Hits New Jersey
articles.author: Kevin Williams
articles.summary: Walmart, in partnership with OpenAI, is introducing an AI-first shopping experience within ChatGPT, allowing customers to plan, browse, and buy directly within the platform. This new service proactively learns customer preferences and provides tailored suggestions, streamlining the shopping process for everyday purchases.
